mapper.insert: insert into c_activity( id, owner, `name`, startDate, endDate, cost, description, createTime, createBy ) values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{cost}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from c_activity
where id = #{id}

select
a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy
from c_activity a join c_user u on a.owner = u.id
where a.id = #{id}

select
a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner
from c_activity a join c_user u on a.owner = u.id join c_clue_activity_relation car on a.id = car.activityId join c_clue c on car.clueId = c.id
where c.id = #{clueId}

select
a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner
from c_activity a join c_user u on a.owner = u.id
where a.id not in ( select a.id from c_activity a join c_clue_activity_relation car on a.id = car.activityId join c_clue c on car.clueId = c.id where c.id = #{clueId} )

select
a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner
from c_activity a join c_user u on a.owner = u.id
where a.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
